channel.title: AI on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Creating post summary with AI from Hugging Face
item.description: Optimize your blog’s SEO and Zenodo metadata with automated summaries using Hugging Face’s text summarization models. Learn how to connect to the Hugging Face API, prepare content, and integrate summaries into your markdown files using R and the httr2 package.
